Required packages

```{r}
library(purrr)
library(repurrrsive)
library(listviewer)
```

`listviewer` is an interactive way to explore objects vs `str`. `wesanderson` is a list from repurrrsive

```{r}
str(wesanderson)
listviewer::jsonedit(wesanderson, mode = "view")
```
